name: HCA Cloud Portal
description: This project is a responsive web application designed to provide HCA developers with a streamlined interface for creating Google Cloud sandbox environments. In addition to environment provisioning, the portal offers educational resources and documentation to help users explore and learn about various Google Cloud services and features.

name: ForzaTrack
description: Web app for Forza Horizon 5 players to log lap times, compare builds, and track performance over time. With filtering, comparisons, and a personal dashboard, it helps racers improve efficiently.

name: Squared Icon Theme
description: A custom file icon theme designed for Visual Studio Code with minimalistic folder designs and square, uniform file icons.

name: Portfolio Site
description: My personal portfolio site (this site!) showcasing my work and experience.
